title: Braun Series 5 5040S Shaver
transcripts:
[MUSIC PLAYING]

Introducing Flex Motion Tec. Individually suspended cutting elements react instantly to even the smallest contours. Automatically steering a 40-degree shaver head. Effortlessly navigating along larger contours. For efficient shaving with less skin pressure, minimizing skin irritation. Patented Ultra Active Lift. Braun's patented Ultra Active Lift makes short work of problem hair. An enhanced oscillating middle trimmer. Lifts and cuts even flay-lying hair with over 290 movements per second for a noticeably finer shaving and fewer strokes -- especially neck and chin area. The New Power Drive with 20 percent more motor power fro constant high speed cutting even on dense hair. the ultimate shaving performance on every terrain. Cross hair Blade. With Braun's Cross Hair Blade, resistance is futile. The combination of sharp blades and ultra thin foils with specially designed foil patterns captures stubborn hairs and even the shortest stubble. For outstanding closure that lasts. 

Triple Action Cutting system. Braun's advanced Triple Action Cutting system. Three individual cutting elements work simultaneously to cut both short and long hairs with ease. For outstanding closeness in fewer strokes. Clean and Charge Station. The world's only alcohol based clean charge station. Maintenance at the touch of a button. First, the intelligent Clean and Charge station starts charging your shaver. Second, it automatically selects the ideal cleaning program. Third, the fluid streams hair stubble while the alcohol kill 99.9 percent of germs. And fourth, special lubricating agents leave the cutting parts in optimal condition so your shaver feels like new every day. Braun Series 5.
